title: Constant Disconnection
body: So uh, my friend and i was playing ARAM and BOTH our internet connections were COMPLETELY fine. 4 minutes into the game, both of us kept getting disconnected. So him and i quit league and came back and it kept happening for about 3 more minutes. When we finished, i got low priority for getting disconnected for NOTHING. i dont know if this is an in game bug or something but i'm really mad that i got low priority for something i didnt do on purpose.
